verbs.description: [ARG1: A letter] [V: sent] [ARG0: by Trump ’s attorneys] [ARG2: to Robert Mueller] claims that Trump ca n’t possibly be guilty of obstruction of justice because he ’s the president and the Special Counsel is part of the executive branch , so he can fire them , end the investigation or pretty much do whatever he wants with no consequences . President Trump ’s lawyers …
